metadata.title: CVE-2023-52339 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In libebml before 1.4.5, an integer overflow in MemIOCallback.cpp can occurwhen reading or writing. It may result in buffer overflows.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52339` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libebml5 - 1.4.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libebml package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.5-1').
